title: Asian Art Council - One Hundred Views of Tokyo Tour and Reception

hero_caption: Toneyama Kojin. Tokyo Rhapsody, 1993. Louise A. Lutz Endowment and Asian Art Council Acquisition funds.
short_description: Members of the Asian Art council are invited for a tour by Janice Katz, Roger L. Weston Associate Curator of Japanese Art, of 100 Views of Tokyo: Message to the 21st Century.
